hero.title: Fullstack Developer
hero.summary: Nearly 2 years of experience building and modernizing production web systems using Java Spring Boot and Angular (19–20). Experienced in real-time data processing, legacy system migration, and admin platform development.

intro.title: Short Self-Introduction (60s)
about.title: About
about.body: I’m a Fullstack Developer specializing in Java/Spring Boot and Angular. I enjoy building reliable admin systems, modernizing legacy codebases (AngularJS → Angular), and designing clean data flows for real-time systems.
skills.title: Skills
skills.backend.title: Backend
skills.backend.desc: Build APIs, integrate messaging/caching, optimize DB interactions.
skills.frontend.title: Frontend
skills.other.title: Other
skills.other.desc: Use Figma to design admin flows/layouts before implementation when needed.
projects.title: Projects
projects.p1.title: Installation Marketplace — Admin System
projects.p1.desc: Built and maintained the admin system of a multi-platform marketplace. Designed admin UI flows in Figma before coding. Delivered REST APIs and optimized DB interactions.
projects.p2.title: AngularJS → Angular 19 Migration
projects.p2.desc: Migrated a legacy AngularJS codebase to Angular 19, refactoring core modules to improve maintainability and performance.
projects.p3.title: IoT Temperature Monitoring
projects.p3.desc: Developed a Java TCP server to receive and process real-time temperature data from IoT devices, store data in MySQL, and visualize on a web dashboard.
projects.p3.b1: Real-time device data ingestion via TCP
projects.p3.b2: Persist & process sensor data in MySQL
experience.title: Experience
experience.b1: Developed and maintained fullstack web applications using Java Spring Boot and Angular.
experience.b2: Designed, implemented, and optimized backend and frontend features for production systems.
experience.b3: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver features on schedule.
contact.title: Contact
contact.body: Interested in working together? Feel free to reach out.
footer.right: Built with HTML/CSS • Hosted on GitHub Pages
